description.value: You've continued to expand your compendium of tools to compile knowledge. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Comprehend Language]{Comprehend Language}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Mindlink]{Mindlink}, and @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Secret Page]{Secret Page} as innate occult spells, each once per day. When you cast secret page, it is automatically heightened to the same spell level as your cantrips from Magical Edification.
